text: Ajam is an Arabic word meaning "non-Arab". Ajam or AJAM may also refer to: *Ajam of Bahrain, an ethnic group in Bahrain *Ajam (band), a British world fusion group *Ajam (maqam), a musical mode in Arabic, Turkish, and related systems of music *Al Jazeera America (AJAM), an American basic cable and satellite news television channel * 'Ajam of Kuwait ==See also== *Ajami (disambiguation)
title: Ajam (disambiguation)
